trans-unit.source: Websites may load outside ads, videos, and other content that contains hidden trackers. Blocking this can make websites load faster, but some buttons, forms, and login fields, might not work.
trans-unit.target: Websites pon chargiar reclamas, videos ed auter cuntegn extern che cuntegna fastizaders zuppads. Cun bloccar quest cuntegn chargian websites pli svelt, ma tscherts buttuns, formulars e champs d'annunzia na funcziunan eventualmain betg pli.
trans-unit.note: Description of content trackers.

trans-unit.source: These cookies follow you from site to site to gather data about what you do online. They are set by third parties such as advertisers and analytics companies.
trans-unit.target: Quests cookies ta suondan dad ina website a la proxima per rimnar datas davart tias activitads en il web. Els vegnan installads da terzas partidas sco firmas da reclama ed analisa.
trans-unit.note: Description of cross-site trackers.

trans-unit.source: Cryptominers secretly use your system’s computing power to mine digital money. Cryptomining scripts drain your battery, slow down your computer, and can increase your energy bill.
trans-unit.target: Criptominiers maldovran adascus las resursas da tes sistem per generar daners digitals. Scripts da criptominiers consuman la battaria, ralenteschan tes computer e pon augmentar il quint da l'electricitad.
trans-unit.note: Description of cryptominers.

trans-unit.source: The settings on your browser and computer are unique. Fingerprinters collect a variety of these unique settings to create a profile of you, which can be used to track you as you browse.
trans-unit.target: La configuraziun da tes navigatur e tes computer è unica. Detecturs dad improntas dal det rimnan differentas da questas configuraziuns per crear in profil da tai che po vegnir duvrà per ta fastizar durant la navigaziun.
trans-unit.note: Description of fingerprinters.

trans-unit.source: Social networks place trackers on other websites to build a more complete and targeted profile of you. Blocking these trackers reduces how much social media companies can see what do you online.
trans-unit.target: Raits socialas plazzeschan fastizaders en autras websites per crear in profil pli cumplet e cler da tai. Cun bloccar quests fastizaders sa reducescha la quantitad dad infurmaziuns davart tias activitads online che las firmas da social media pon rimnar.
trans-unit.note: Description of social network trackers.

trans-unit.source: Meet your personalized homepage. Recent tabs, bookmarks, and search results will appear here.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This one talks about additions to the Firefox homepage regarding a more personalized experience.

trans-unit.source: Your tabs are syncing! Pick up where you left off on your other device.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. When a user is logged in and has a tab synced from desktop, this popup indicates which tab that is within the Jump Back In section.

trans-unit.source: Move the toolbar to the bottom in settings if that’s more your style.
